lead_paragraph: Companies rushed to accept an offer from RSA Security to replace SecurID tokens, used to safeguard access to computer networks, after RSA admitted the tokens’ vulnerability.

headline.seo: RSA Security Faces Angry Users Over Breach
headline.main: RSA Faces Angry Users After Breach
headline.print_headline: RSA Faces Angry Users After Breach

snippet: Companies rushed to accept an offer from RSA Security to replace SecurID tokens, used to safeguard access to computer networks, after RSA admitted the tokens’ vulnerability.

keywords.value: RSA, The Security Division of EMC Corporation
keywords.name: organizations

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Verne G. Kopytoff, Riva Richmond and Eric Dash.
byline.original: By NELSON D. SCHWARTZ and CHRISTOPHER DREW
